Serial number: AV25-163Date: March 25, 2025
On March 25, 2025, VMware published a Security Advisory to address a vulnerability in the following product:
VMware Tools – versions 11.x.x and 12.x.x prior to 12.5.1 for Windows
The Cyber Centre encourages users and administrators to review the provided web links and perform the suggested mitigations.
VMSA-2025-0005: VMware Tools for Windows update addresses an authentication bypass vulnerability (CVE-2025-22230)
Security Advisories - VMware Cloud Foundation
